articles.description: Both Stephen Alexander’s elementary teachers and televised NASA missions throughout the ‘60s influenced his journey into science. He recounts NASA’s legacy, 65 years after the agency’s inception.
articles.content:
Sixty-five years ago, in 1958, several government programs that had been pursuing spaceflight combined to form NASA. At the time, I was only 3 years old.
Ive now been a professor of physics and astr… [+6921 chars]

articles.author: Josh Dinner
articles.title: Pioneering NASA 'Hidden Figure' Evelyn Boyd Granville dies at age 99 - Space.com
articles.description: Evelyn Boyd Granville helped NASA land the first Americans on the moon.
articles.content:
Trailblazing NASA "Hidden Figure" and Black mathematician, Evelyn Boyd Granville, has died at the age of 99. 
Granville was one of the first two Black women in the United States to earn a Ph.D in ma… [+2257 chars]
